altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスターSPECIAL スカーレット・バイオレット

description.en: Violet, the “prince of speed” who drives Miraidon, runs through the Paldea region in search of the “secret spice” to regain the ability of Miraidon! A showdown with the Nushi Pokemon! Operation Stardust! And the other main character...!?
description.es: Violet, el “príncipe de la velocidad” que conduce a Miraidon, corre por la región de Paldea en busca de la “especia secreta” para recuperar la habilidad de Miraidon. ¡Un enfrentamiento con el Pokémon Nushi! ¡Operación Polvo de Estrellas! ¿¡Y el otro personaje principal...!?
description.ja: ミライドンを駆る“スピード王子”バイオレットが、ミライドンの能力を取り戻すべく「秘伝スパイス」を求めてパルデア地方を駆け巡る！　ヌシポケモンとの対決！　スターダスト作戦！　そしてもう一人の主人公は…!?

description.en: It's been a thousand years since the world was covered in a sea of ​​sand. The former scientific civilization has perished, and the surviving humans are in a harsh struggle for survival against giant water-stealing creatures known as aqua gorgers. One day, Noah, a boy who lives in a remote sea area, saves a woman who is being chased by aqua gorgers, but she turns out to be an incarnation of the God of Fire, who has the power to burn anything she touches…!? A boy and a girl travel in search of paradise at the end of the sand sea. A hyperclassical desert punk fantasy!!!
description.ja: 水の楽園を求めてバトル&エアトリック&アドベンチャー！王道ギガ盛りデザートパンクファンタジー!!　世界が砂の海に覆われて千年。かつて栄えた科学文明は滅び、生き残った人類は水を奪う巨大な異形《水喰（みずはみ）》との過酷な生存競争を繰り広げていた。辺境の海域に住む少年・ノアはある日水喰に追われる女性を助けるのだが、彼女はその身に触れるものを焼くほどの力を持つ《ヒノカミ》の化身だった…!? 砂の海の果てにある楽園を求め旅する少年と少女。

title.en: Will the Sea King Tip the Boat Today?

description.en:
I thought I could swim into this beautiful jiejie's heart, but I didn't realize she was a sea king! Encountering love and turmoil from the very first page, Li Haijue decided to let go of herself—to embrace the role of Sea King—and experience a different kind of love story! At the same time, this hidden, mysterious world begins to unravel itself. What does the “Sea King” title on top of her head truly mean..?

TL/N: “Sea King” is Chinese slang for someone who keeps many lovers at the same time! Much like how a King of the Sea rules over all the fish, so does Haijue over the people in her world.

Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

description.en:
"Chubby Cats and Dogs" is a heartwarming, healing, and eye-opening little comic.

Welcome to our little universe!

Translated from Amazon.com.jp.

Ordinary days, they are quite a blessing... A genius presents, a yonkoma about the daily life of a newlywed couple.

Iroha-san and Hajime-kun have just moved into a new house. They start from scratch, steadily building their lives together. Going out to buy home appliances, or visiting the convenience store late at night, such ordinary daily life is an irreplaceable happiness for the couple.

This is a book that gives readers an irresistibly warm feeling (while keeping the jokes just as sharp).

title.en: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 一緒に暮らしていいですか？

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition...
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

altTitles.es-la: Una novela gráfica en serie: ¡Drama Matutino!

altTitles.ja: 連続漫画小説 あさドラ!

description.en: In 2020, a large creature rampages through Tokyo, destroying everything in its path. In 1959, Asa Asada, a spunky young girl from a huge family in Nagoya, is kidnapped for ransom—and not a soul notices. When a typhoon hits Nagoya, Asa and her kidnapper must work together to survive. But there’s more to her kidnapper and this storm than meets the eye.
description.es-la: En 2020, una gran criatura arrasa Tokio, destruyendo todo a su paso. En 1959, Asa Asada, una valiente joven de una gran familia de Nagoya, es secuestrada para pedir un rescate y nadie se da cuenta. Cuando un tifón golpea Nagoya, Asa y su secuestrador deben trabajar juntos para sobrevivir. Pero el secuestrador y la tormenta son más de lo que parece.
description.pt-br: Em 2020, uma grande criatura invade Tóquio, destruindo tudo em seu caminho. Em 1959, Asa Asada, uma jovem corajosa de uma família enorme em Nagoya, é sequestrada por resgate – e nem uma alma percebe. Quando um tufão atinge Nagoya, Asa e seu sequestrador devem trabalhar juntos para sobreviver. Mas há mais em seu sequestrador e nesta tempestade do que aparenta.

description.en: In ancient times, a vile dragon summoned a flood that drowned the village. Since then, every year, the villagers would sacrifice a bride to the dragon for it to eat, doing so ensured the safety and peace of the village. This year, it is the Black Dragon YanMing’s turn to take the sacrificed bride, however he takes no interest in humans and would rather live on a diet of fruits. But, due to the constant nagging of the housekeeper, magpie XiQue, he had no choice but to go to the village and receive the bride offered by the village. YanMing, who was originally against the idea of going, couldn’t help but notice that the “mute” bride was so strange! She wasn’t afraid of him, but instead, very excited?! Whatever…let's capture her first!
Two high school students are using bugs in our reality to exploit them for their advantage. But then a ridiculous exploit leads to severe consequences for one of them...

Suzuki-kun and Takagi-san — two high-schoolers who found each other in a time loop on August 31. The two are the only ones who keep their memories when it loops. As for the cause of the time loop, one thing comes to mind — Suzuki-kun's lingering regrets for the summer, a guy's greatest ambition....

It's a time loop comedy of youth, romance, and facing love head-on!
___
**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10613/episode/353159)
description.ja:
何度も繰り返す8月31日の中で出会った高校生の二人・鈴木くんと高木さん。

記憶を繰り越せるのは二人だけ。

タイムループの原因として考えられるのは、鈴木くんが夏休みにやり残した、男子最大の目標…。

恋と真っ向から対峙する、青春タイムループコメディ！
description.ru:
31 августа повторяется снова и снова. Сохранить об этом воспоминания могут только два школьника – Сузуки-кун и Такаги-сан. Задумавшись о причине возникновения такой временной петли, Сузуки-кун пришёл к выводу, что всё дело в нём: его незавершённых делах летом и большом сожалении на этот счёт. Чтобы выбраться из временной тюрьмы подросток решает действовать…
Вас ждёт любовная комедия противостояния любви и временной петли!
description.vi: Thế giới bị rơi vào 1 vòng lặp thời gian, chỉ có 2 người giữ lại được ký ức là Suzuki và Takagi. Nếu muốn thoát khỏi vòng lặp thì Suzuki phải hoàn thành ước nguyện còn dang dở của cậu: kiếm được bạn gái và thoát kiếp trai tân.

description.en: What should you do when a junior colleague of the same sex confesses their feelings for you, and is persistently pursuing you? Not only does voice actor Mason find himself in such a situation, but also unexpectedly discovers that this junior is the very same doujinshi artist behind the R-rated fan comics featuring the two of them! Furthermore, the two are set to work together on a BL radio drama...

The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

altTitles.en: The Rise of Tanaka in Another World

altTitles.ja: タナカの異世界成り上がり

description.en: Chuunibyou old man gets summoned to another world.

"I only shine under your lens."

[Silent Yet Passionate X Luring]

Nan Mo, the top photographer in the country, having captured numerous internet celebrities and stars, still finds Jiang Yudai as her one and only obsession in her midnight dreams. Jiang Yudai became Grand Slam actress at the age of 18, and a decade later, she remains at the peak of popularity. She possesses an alluring, distant gaze and an untouchable, ethereal beauty. No one knows that behind the scenes, Jiang Yudai, under an online persona, she frequently expresses her love on Nan Mo's account, yearning for Nan Mo's lens to touch every inch of her body.

Ranze Etou is an adorable immortal girl with a vampire father and a werewolf mother who would throw things at each other when they get into childish fights. Ranze, however, just wants to live like a normal girl and lead a normal life. Unfortunately, she is "blessed" with the power to turn into anything she bites. For example, if she accidentally bites a cake the wrong way, then she will turn into a cake. The only way to return to normal is to sneeze! Ranze is in love with Shun Makabe, who is a handsome human boy at school. However, a human girl (without much hair) named Youko also likes Shun, and she will do anything to reveal that Ranze is not a human!! Things get even more complicated when Ranze meets Aaron, who is the prince of the Spirit World. Aaron falls in love with Ranze and first sight, and he will do whatever it takes to win her away from Shun… Tokimeki Tonight was one of the hottest mangas in Japan, and you sure don't want to miss this hilarious comedy!  
  
NOTE: This manga does NOT have defined chapters - each volume is about 150 pages of continuous artwork and story. The volumes were split into chapters by the groups for convenience.

title.en: Ware ni Cheat o ~Hazure Cheat no Shoukan Yuusha wa Isekai de Yukkuri Kurashitai~

altTitles.ja: 我にチートを ～ハズレチートの召喚勇者は異世界でゆっくり暮らしたい～

altTitles.en: Give Me Cheat!: The Summoned Hero with Trash Cheats Lives a Slow Life in a Different World

description.en: Amidst the annual summoning of over 1,000 heroes, Saburou's summoning bonus is a mere +1 to luck. Dubbed the most disappointing hero in a decade, he begins a laid-back life in another world with a doll princess as his companion. What adventures await him in this new life?
description.ja: 年間1000名を超える勇者が召喚される中、勇者サブロウに与えられた召喚ボーナスは運+1。10年に1度のガッカリ勇者となった男は、与えられた人形姫をお供にマイペースな異世界生活を始めるが!?

altTitles.de: Die Tagebücher der Apothekerin - Geheimnisse am Kaiserhof

altTitles.th: สืบคดีปริศนา หมอยาตำรับโคมแดง เล่ม

description.de: Maomao ist eine unscheinbare Dienerin am Kaiserlichen kaiserlichen Hof. Zumindest bemüht sie sich, so gesehen zu werden. Denn seit sie in den Dienst des Kaisers verkauft wurde, hat die junge Apothekerin alles darangesetzt, ihre Schuld abzuarbeiten, ohne weiteres Aufsehen zu erregen, damit sie bald nach Hause zurückkehren kann. Aber Maomao ist schlau – und viel zu neugierig. Als die Kronprinzen einer nach dem anderen einem mysteriösen „Fluch“ erliegen, mischt sie sich heimlich ein, um das Rätsel zu lösen. Dabei erregt sie die Aufmerksamkeit des Eunuchen Jinshi – und eh sie sichs versieht, wird sie mitten in die Intrigen am Kaiserhof hineingezogen…
description.en: Maomao, a young woman trained in the art of herbal medicine, is forced to work as a lowly servant in the inner palace. Though she yearns for life outside its perfumed halls, she isn’t long for a life of drudgery! Using her wits to break a “curse” afflicting the imperial heirs, Maomao attracts the attentions of the handsome eunuch Jinshi and is promoted to attendant food taster. But Jinshi has other plans for the erstwhile apothecary, and soon Maomao is back to brewing potions and…solving mysteries?!
description.fr:
À 17 ans, Mao Mao a une vie compliquée. Formée dès son jeune âge par un apothicaire du quartier des plaisirs, elle se retrouve enlevée et vendue comme servante dans le quartier des femmes du palais impérial! Entouré de hauts murs, il est coupé du monde extérieur. Afin de survivre dans cette prison de luxe grouillant de complots et de basses manœuvres, la jeune fille tente de cacher ses connaissances pour se fondre dans la masse.

Mais, quand les morts suspectes de princes nouveau-nés mettent la cour en émoi, sa passion pour les poisons prend le dessus. Elle observe, enquête… et trouve la solution! En voulant bien faire, la voilà repérée… Jinshi, haut fonctionnaire aussi beau que calculateur, devine son talent et la promeut goûteuse personnelle d’une des favorites de l’empereur. Au beau milieu de ce nid de serpents, le moindre faux pas peut lui être fatal!

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.id: Diculik dan dijual ke harem, Maomao berusaha bertahan dengan kemampuannya beradaptasi. Wawasan yang luas tentang obat-obatan membuat karirnya melompat tinggi, langsung menjadi pelayan pribadi selir kesayangan kaisar!
description.it:
Maomao, una giovane farmacista del quartiere a luci rosse della capitale, viene venduta suo malgrado come sguattera alla corte imperiale. Anche se desidera ardentemente tornare libera, si ritrova a non disdegnare la vita tutto sommato comoda che è riuscita a ritagliarsi a palazzo, dove, senza farsi notare, riesce a proseguire i suoi studi di fitoterapia e sulla preparazione dei veleni. Di fronte a un male che affligge i figli dell’imperatore, Maomao sente tuttavia di farsi avanti e, sfruttando le sue conoscenze, riesce a salvare loro la vita. La ragazza attira così le attenzioni del bel eunuco Jinshi, che ha in mente per lei dei piani ben precisi.

---
Giovani donne vengono spesso vendute per lavorare per un breve periodo nell'harem dell'imperatore. È questo il caso di Maomao, farmacista presso il quartiere a luci rosse. Non ha alcun interesse nel farsi notare a palazzo e preferisce starsene per conto suo a preparare medicine, studiare veleni o fare esperimenti su se stessa. Ma quando a corte si diffonde la voce che i figli dell'imperatore sono destinati a una morte prematura, Maomao non riesce a rimanere indifferente. Mentre cerca di indagare, cattura l'attenzione di misterioso e affascinante ufficiale di alto rango. Ha così inizio la sua particolare carriera.
description.ja:
宮中に名探偵誕生!?

「小説家になろう」発! 
ヒーロー文庫の大人気タイトル『薬屋のひとりごと』が、待望のコミカライズ! 
中世の宮中で下働きをする少女・猫猫(マオマオ)。
花街で薬師をやっていた彼女が、帝の御子たちが皆短命であるこという噂を聞いてしまったところから、物語は動き始める。
持ち前の好奇心と知識欲に突き動かされ、興味本位でその原因を調べ始める猫猫の運命は――…!?
「小説家になろう」は株式会社ヒナプロジェクトの登録商標です。
description.pl: Maomao, ambitna młoda zielarka, zostaje porwana i trafia do haremu cesarza jako służąca. Aby nie pogarszać sytuacji, w której się znalazła, zataja swoje umiejętności, a nawet fakt, że potrafi czytać i pisać. Tymczasem nowo narodzone dzieci władcy umierają na skutek tajemniczej klątwy. Zielarka szybko orientuje się, że to nie magia, ale trucizna jest przyczyną śmierci niemowląt. Decyduje się ostrzec księżniczki, podrzucając do ich komnat wiadomość o powodach niezwykłej choroby ich dzieci. Dziewczyna nie przypuszcza nawet, jak bardzo ta decyzja zaważy na jej losie. Tym bardziej, że znalazła się w miejscu, w którym nikt nie może czuć się bezpieczny...
description.ru:
В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?! Адаптация одноимённого ранобэ.  


---

- Won the Grand Prize in the Printed Manga category at the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Award 2019.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekokurage_)  
- [Japanese Light Novel Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/160955/)  
- [Official English Light Novel Translation](https://j-novel.club/s/the-apothecary-diaries/)  
- [Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/tomes-1382-carnets-de-l-apothicaire.html)  
- [Official Chinese (Simplified) Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28218)
description.th:
ณ อาณาจักรใหญ่ยักษ์แห่งหนึ่งซึ่งตั้งอยู่ใจกลางทวีป เด็กสาวนางหนึ่งผู้ทำงานเป็นหมอยาในสถานเริงรมย์ย่านโคมแดงอันมีนามว่า ‘เมาเมา’ บัดนี้เกิดจับพลัดจับผลูต้องมาทำงานรับใช้อยู่ในวังหลัง

เธอทำได้เพียงเฝ้ารอให้หมดวาระการทำงานอย่างสงบเสงี่ยมเจียมตัว ด้วยรูปร่างหน้าตาที่ไม่สะสวยจึงมั่นใจเป็นนักหนาว่าตนจะไม่มีวันโดนจักรพรรดิเรียกไปเป็น ‘คู่นอน’ อย่างแน่แท้

แต่ในขณะนั้นเอง โอรสธิดาของจักรพรรดิกลับมีเหตุให้อายุสั้น
พอรู้ว่าสองทารกน้อยที่ยังเหลือรอดกำลังป่วยหนัก เมาเมาจึงลงมือขุดคุ้ยหาสาเหตุ—
description.uk: Ще зовсым юна Мамао досліджує мистецтво лікування травами, мріючи відкрити ліки від усіх недуг. Однак проти своєї волі вона потрапляє в імператорський гарем як служниця. Вона вирішує приховати набуті знання, тому прикидається однією з багатьох неписьменних дівчат. Тим часом діти правителя гинуть за загадкових обставин. Коли весь двір говорить про таємниче прокляття, Маомао розпізнає симптоми отруєння. Але як застерегти зневірених матерів від небезпеки, коли в оточенні імператора голос простого слуги нічого не означає? За воротами Внутрішнього палацу будь-якої миті може статися чергова трагедія. Чи знайде Маомао своє місце в цьому світі, повному інтриг?
description.vi:
Miêu Miêu là một cô gái làm công việc hầu hạ trong cung đình thời phong kiến.
Câu chuyện của chúng ta bắt đầu với việc cô gái từng hành nghề dược sư ở phố hoa này nghe thấy người ta đồn thổi rằng: tất cả những đứa con của Hoàng đế đều đoản mệnh.
Bị thúc đẩy bởi niềm khát khao tri thức và tính hiếu kì cố hữu, Miêu Miêu bắt tay vào tìm hiểu nguyên nhân, xem đó như một cách giải khuây không hơn không kém.
description.pt-br:
Em uma certa corte imperial, já faz alguns meses desde que uma garota de 17 anos conhecida como Maomao foi sequestrada e forçada a trabalhar como uma serva de baixo escalão no palácio do imperador. Ainda assim, ela consegue manter seu espírito curioso e pragmático, planejando trabalhar até que seus anos de servidão acabem. Um dia, no entanto, ela descobre que os dois bebês do imperador ficaram gravemente doentes. Ela decide agir secretamente, aproveitando sua experiência como farmacêutica criada no pobre distrito da luz vermelha.

Apesar das tentativas de Maomao de permanecer anônima, ela logo chama a atenção de Jinshi, um eunuco influente que reconhece seus talentos. Maomao logo se encontra na corte interna do imperador, onde gradualmente faz seu nome ao utilizar seu conhecimento e personalidade excêntrica para resolver vários mistérios médicos.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 5, Cap 40. ]
description.zh-hk: 時值中世紀，位處大陸中央的某個大國，有位姑娘名喚貓貓，原本在煙花巷擔任藥師，現在則在後宮當下女。其間，貓貓無意間聽說皇子皆年幼早夭的傳聞，並得知連尚在人世的皇子皇女也身染重病，她於是開始調查其病因──廣獲讚譽的酣暢淋漓推理之作，眾所期盼的第一集終於出版。以中世紀東方為舞臺，「試毒」少女將一一解決宮中發生的懸疑案件！

altTitles.ja: コインランドリーの女

description.en: Some random gag stories happening around a woman living inside the washer in the coin laundry. Why does she like to live there?
description.pt-br: Esta é a história de Maoko, a misteriosa garota que vive em uma lavanderia automática frequentada por Haru Tanaka, que se vê obrigada a lidar com ela, e sua relação com as estranhos figuras que lá encontra. São histórias com humor e emoção, e de uma absurda máquina de secar!

description.en: They come for three reasons: to say hello, to like you, or to harm you.
description.id: Mereka datang dengan tiga alasan, sekedar menyapamu, menyukaimu, atau ingin mencelakaimu.

description.en:
Feng Wu was born with the true blood of the phoenix and was hailed as a peerless genius in all of Junwu. However, her blessing was also a curse...it placed a target on her back. After she was attacked and had her blood stolen, her master Mu Jiuzhou exhausted his spiritual power to save Feng Wu and disappeared right in front of her. Powerless, she could only watch.

Starting again from the beginning, she resolves herself "Zuo Qingyun, our relation is irreconcilable, I cannot live in a world with you in it!"

Watch how our "useless" protagonist becomes a phoenix step by step!
description.fr:
Feng Wu, une jeune fille talentueuse, perd son sang de phénix et devient inutile après avoir été piégée par son ennemi Zuo Qingyuan. Son professeur tombe dans un profond sommeil après l'avoir sauvée. Fei Chai, une étudiante en médecine traditionnelle de l'ère moderne, entre accidentellement dans ce monde fantastique par le biais d'un jeu et prend l'identité de Feng Wu. Il s'avère que Feng Wu a conclu un accord de mariage avec Jun Linyuan, prince du clan Jun Wu. Feng Wu commence une nouvelle vie, utilisant ses connaissances modernes et ses compétences médicales pour aider sa famille, tout en passant ses journées à se cultiver. Elle se fait ainsi de nouveaux amis et tombe amoureuse de Jun Linzhou.

⋆┊Adapté du novel "Godly Empress Doctor" de Su Xiaonuan

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

altTitles.th: ศึกตำนาน 7 อัศวิน

description.de: Die SEVEN DEADLY SINS gelten als die übelsten Verbrecher Britannias! Prinzessin Elizabeth sucht trotzdem nach ihnen. Sie will ihr Königreich zurückerobern und da kämen ihr die berüchtigten Banditen gerade recht.
description.en:
The "Seven Deadly Sins," a group of evil knights who conspired to overthrow the kingdom of Britannia, were said to have been eradicated by the Holy Knights, although some claim that they still live. Ten years later, the Holy Knights have staged a Coup d'état and captured the king, becoming the new, tyrannical rulers of the kingdom. Elizabeth, the king's third daughter, sets out on a journey to find the "Seven Deadly Sins," and to enlist their help in taking back the kingdom.  


---
description.fi: Pelätyt "seitsemän kuolemansyntiä" ovat koko valtakunnassa etsintäkuulutettuja rikollisia. Mutta nyt heitä etsii joku muukin kuin lain koura! Eikä kaikki ole aina sitä miltä näyttää...
description.fr:
La princesse Elizabeth est prête à tout pour retrouver la légendaire bande de mercenaires connue sous le nom de « Seven Deadly Sins. » À ses yeux, eux seuls ont le pouvoir d’arracher le royaume de Britannia des mains des surpuissants Chevaliers Sacrés qui sèment la terreur! Sa rencontre avec Meliodas, un garçon à la force exceptionnelle, et Hawk, son cochon, va marquer le début d’une aventure riche en rebondissements, où magie et combats sont au rendez-vous!

Plonge dans cette épopée chevaleresque dans la plus pure tradition de l’heroic fantasy!
description.id:
Seven deadly sins, pemberontak legendaris yang konon dituding berkomplot untuk menggulingkan kerajaan. 

Bahkan hingga saat ini pun, mereka masih diburu oleh Holy Knights, tokoh penting kerajaan yang kekuatannya setara seribu prajurit.

Tapi, kemudian muncul seorang gadis yang mencari seven deadly sins dengan memendam perasaan getir, maka dimulailah petualangan menakjubkan.
description.ja: かつて王国転覆をはかったとされる伝説の逆賊〈七つの大罪〉。今もなお執拗に、そのお尋ね者を追うは、王国の要・一騎当千の聖騎士たち。しかし、切なる想いを胸に秘め、〈七つの大罪〉を捜す一人の少女が現れた時、世界の様相を一変させるとびきりの冒険が始まった！ 痛快無比のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕！！
description.pl:
Siedem Grzechów Głównych było niegdyś najpotężniejszą, złożoną wyłącznie z groźnych przestępców, grupą wojowników królestwa Britannii. Jednak po oskarżeniu ich o próbę rebelii, zostali rozgromieni przez Świętych Rycerzy. Członkowie drużyny rozproszyli się po świecie i słuch o nich zaginął. Wieść niesie, że wszyscy zginęli, ale czy aby na pewno...?
Dziesięć lat później sytuacja w kraju uległa diametralnej zmianie - Święci Rycerze dokonali zamachu stanu, uwięzili króla i przejęli władzę w państwie. W nadziei na ukrócenie ich despotycznych rządów, królewna Elizabeth wyrusza na poszukiwanie Siedmiu Grzechów Głównych, chcąc prosić ich o pomoc. Po wielu tygodniach wędrówki, wyczerpana podróżą mdleje na progu maleńkiej gospody. Właścicielem przybytku okazuje się młody chłopak imieniem Meliodas, który pomaga jej dojść do siebie. Jednak królewnie nie będzie dane odpocząć - nagle w drzwiach pojawiają się bowiem rycerze królestwa. Kiedy sytuacja wydaje się beznadziejna na ich drodze staje Meliodas, popisując się nieludzką wręcz siłą. Czy to możliwe, żeby ten niepozorny młodzieniec, okazał się jednym z legendarnych wojowników?
description.pt:
No passado, os Sete Pecados Capitais eram cavaleiros que protegiam Brittania. Hoje, eles são fugitivos procurados pelo reino por conta de sua tentativa de golpe de estado há dez anos, quando os Paladinos, os cavaleiros mais fortes do reino, foram chamados para combatê-los.Ou pelo menos é essa a versão oficial. A princesa Elizabeth acredita que os Sete Pecados Capitais, na verdade, são a única esperança de salvação do reino, que supostamente teria sido tomado pelos Paladinos, os verdadeiros vilões! E assim, quando, por acidente, ela acaba encontrando um deles (Meliodas), começa a jornada da princesa em busca de todos os sete, nessa clássica aventura fantástica!

---
Os "Sete Pecados Capitais" era o mais forte grupo de cavaleiros que defendiam a região de Britannia. Há dez anos eles foram acusados de tentar dar um golpe para tomar o reino e teriam sido impedidos pelos Paladinos, guerreiros sagrados poderosíssimos do reino de Lyonesse, e fugido.

Hoje, os Sete Pecados Capitais ainda são procurados e tidos como lendas, ninguém sabe se eles estão vivos ou mortos, mas indícios de que os Paladinos talvez não sejam tão idôneos assim começam a surgir pelo reino.

Surge então a terceira princesa, Elizabeth, que vê seu reino sofrer nas mãos dos Paladinos e parte à procura dos Sete Pecados Capitais, acreditando que eles não são maus por causa das histórias que seu pai contava. E então ela se encontra com Meliodas, um homem com cara de menino, dono da taverna Chapéu do Javali e curiosamente com o mesmo nome de um dos Sete Pecados Capitais.

Juntos eles partem em uma aventura para procurar os outros Pecados e tentar descobrir o que está acontecendo nos reinos da região.
description.ru:
Могущественный орден Святых рыцарей, которых почитают как великих героев, совершает государственный переворот с целью установить в королевстве свою диктатуру. Дочь плененного короля отправляется в путешествие, чтобы отыскать последнюю надежду на спасение - членов легендарного рыцарского ордена "Семь Смертных Грехов", которых считают величайшими преступниками этой эпохи…  
  
One of the original manuscripts - "Chapter X" - can be read [here](https://kodanshacomics.com/2015/11/12/seven-deadly-sins-chapter-x/).  
  
- Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Awards in the shounen category.
description.tr: Bir zamanlar krallığı devirmeye çalıştığı söylenen efsanevi hainler "yedi ölümcül günah". Halen bütün aramalara rağmen bulunamayan bu grubun Peşinde olanlar, kraliyete bağlı binlerce kutsal şovalye. Ancak acı veren hislerini kalbine gömüp, "yedi ölümcül günah"ı arayan tek başına bir kız ortaya çıktığında, dünyanın durumunu tamamen değiştiren bir macera başladı! Bu heyecan verici, eşsiz destansı fantazi, perdelerini aralıyor!!
description.es-la:
¡El manga más esperado! Fantasía heroica, aventuras y humor en estado puro.

Todos saben que los Siete Pecados Capitales fueron unos rebeldes legendarios que conspiraron contra el reino, y por ello los Caballeros Sagrados aún los buscan tenazmente. Sin embargo hay una joven que intenta encontrarlos para que salven su reino.
description.pt-br: Os "Sete Pecados Capitais", um grupo maligno de cavaleiros que conspiraram para derrubar o reino de Britânia, supostamente foram erradicados pelos Cavaleiros Divinos, embora ainda existam rumores de que eles estão vivos. Dez anos depois, os Cavaleiros Divinos realizaram um golpe de estado e assassinaram o rei, se tornando os novos e tiranos governantes do reino. Elizabeth, a única filha do rei, sai em uma jornada para encontrar os "Sete Pecados Capitais", e recrutá-los para que possam ajudar a tomar o reino de volta.
description.zh-hk: 曾經試圖顛覆王國的傳說中的逆賊．「七大罪」，王國的中樞．以一擋百的聖騎士們至今依然不斷在追捕他們。不過，如今心中藏著殷切想法想要尋找「七大罪」的少女出現，展開了一段足以改變世界樣貌的驚心動魄冒險！無比痛快的英雄科幻冒險故事開幕囉！

title.en: Motto Manga de Wakaru! Fate/Grand Order

altTitles.ja: もっとマンガで分かる！Fate/Grand Order

altTitles.id: Belajar Lagi dengan Manga! Fate/Grand Order

description.en: A manga which helps you learn more about Fate/Grand Order!

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

As a child, Mamiya Sakura mysteriously disappeared in the woods behind her grandma's home. She returned whole and healthy, but since then, she has had the power to see ghosts. Now a teenager, she just wishes the ghosts would leave her alone! At school, the desk next to Sakura's has been empty since the start of the school year. Then one day her always-absent classmate Rokudo Rinne shows up, and he's far more than what he seems! After school one day, Rinne helps Sakura deal with the ghost of a boy who has a crush on her. Rinne, it seems, knows just how to handle such ghosts, and has the skills and tools to properly dispatch them to the afterlife (for a small fee of course). Sakura starts to learn more about her mysterious classmate, and her curiosity about Rinne draws her deeper into the amazing world between life and death.  


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/rin-ne)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Circle of Reincarnation Rinne**


  
The following links are to AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime:  
[Season 1](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16546)  
[Season 2](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=17656)  
[Season 3](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18755)

altTitles.th: เกมกลคนอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
description.pt-br: O estudante Yugi Mutou passou a maior parte de seu tempo sozinho jogando jogos - até que ele resolveu o Enigma do Milênio, um artefato egípcio misterioso! Possuída pelo quebra-cabeça, Yugi se torna o Yu-Gi-Oh(O Rei dos Jogos), e irá enfrentar os desafios dos Jogos das Sombras - Jogos mortais com grandes apostas e altos riscos, como apostar a sua alma e a alma de seus queridos amigos! O mangá contém novas histórias não vistas no anime, incluindo a origem de Yugi e seus amigos!

description.fr: Un lycéen, Kang Seon Woo, affronte à lui seul un groupe de prêteurs sur gages s'étant introduit chez lui. À l’hôpital, où il se rend pour se faire soigner, un mystérieux homme lui propose de participer à un des tournois de combat illégaux avec une énorme récompense . Ce prix est crucial pour la survie de sa famille.
description.pt-br: Um estudante do ensino médio, Kang Sunwoo, derrota sozinho um grupo de agiotas ilegais que foram até sua casa. No hospital, onde ele vai para tratamento, ele é convidado por um homem misterioso para participar de um torneio de luta suspeito com um grande prêmio em dinheiro. O prêmio é crucial para a sobrevivência de sua família. Sunwoo deve sobreviver à Fighting Ward!

description.en:
Seonwoo Yoo, a senior in the photography department, is working as a photographer. One day, he receives a collaboration proposal from a famous overseas magazine.

For a while, such a fluttering heart

Recently, a jokjok ghost taking a picture is taken together

'Seon-woo', who suffered from a psychic phenomenon, tries in various ways to solve it, but it is not easy.

In the meantime, the psychic picture was not taken.

They find the only subject... It is none other than the most famous playboy on campus, 'Choi Moo-young! "Model? Let me do it. Go out with me instead."

Will 'Seonwoo' be able to take a picture of 'Mooyoung' and debut safely in a famous overseas magazine?!

The dilemma of a horror romance with him, who never wants to be involved, begins!
A spinoff of Tohai starring Doujima, nicknamed "Lion".

altTitles.ja: 終末の花嫁様 -sweet home†melty life-

description.en:
Michiru, born under his extremely religious mother, believes that one day an angel would come down and save him from his suffering and pain. 

After getting severely bruised and beaten up from the kids at his school, his nextdoor neighbor, Hikari, comes to his aide and carries him to her home. While Michiru is asleep, she rampages the world, destroying everything. 

When he awakes, it is revealed to him that Hikari is an angel. Michiru asks Hikari to marry him, which she gladly accepts. 

Will their sudden post-apocalypse and newlywed life give Michiru what he always wanted? Or is there more to it under the surface?
description.id:
"Tolong... Menikahlah denganku!"

Michiru, seorang anak laki-laki yang tidak memiliki "tempat tinggal" baik di rumah maupun di sekolah.
Hikari, onee-san kikuk yang merupakan tetangga dari Michiru.
Sebuah proposal tiba-tiba dibuat.

Setitik cahaya yang muncul di tengah-tengah keseharian yang menyakitkan dan melelahkan.
Di tengah keseharian itu, dunia mengalami kehancuran.

Sebuah keseharian pasutri antara seorang bocah dan malaikat dimulai!

(Sumber sinopsis : Amazon)
description.ja:
「私と…結婚してください！」

家にも学校にも居場所がない少年・みちるは、近所に住むうっかりやのお姉さん・ひかりに突然プロポーズされる。苦しくて、退屈な毎日の中で唯一の光。そんなある日、世界が滅んでしまって――

title.en: The Strongest Sage with the Weakest Crest

altTitles.ja-ro: Shikkaku Mon no Saikyou Kenja - Sekai Saikyou no Kenja ga Sara ni Tsuyoku naru Tame ni Tensei Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 失格紋の最強賢者 ～世界最強の賢者が更に強くなるために転生しました～

altTitles.ko: 실격문장의 최강 현자 ~세계 최강의 현자가 더욱 강해지기 위해 환생했습니다~

altTitles.zh-hk: 失格紋的最強賢者 ～世界最強的賢者為了變得更強而轉生了～

altTitles.en: The Strongest Sage with the Weakest Crest: The World's Strongest Sage Was Reincarnated to Become Even Stronger
The Strongest Sage with a Disqualified Crest

altTitles.ja-ro: Shikkaku Mon no Saikyō Kenja ~ Sekai Saikyō no Kenja ga Sarani Tsuyoku naru Tame ni Tensei Shimashita ~

altTitles.zh: 失格纹的最强贤者～世界最强的贤者为了变得更强而转生了

altTitles.th: ปราชญ์หนึ่งในใต้หล้ากับตราสุดอัปยศ-จอมปราชญ์โคตรแกร่ง

altTitles.de: Der stärkste Held mit dem Mal der Schwäche

altTitles.ru: Сиккакумон но сайкё: кэндзя ~Сэкай сайкё: но кэндзя нга сара ни цуёку нару тамэ ни тэнсэйсимасита~

altTitles.fr: Le sage le plus fort avec la plus faible des marques ~ Le sage le plus fort du monde s'est réincarné pour devenir encore plus puissant ~

altTitles.ja-ro: Shikkaku Mon no Saikyou Kenja - Sekai Saikyou no Kenja ga Sara ni Tsuyoku naru Tame ni Tensei Shimashita

altTitles.vi: Hiền Giả Mạnh Nhất Với Dấu Ấn Yếu Nhất

description.en:
His strength limited by the magical crest with which he was born, Mathias, the world's most powerful sage, decides reincarnation is necessary to become the strongest of all.

Upon his rebirth as a young boy, Mathias is thrilled to discover he's been born with the optimal crest for magical combat on his first try! Unfortunately, the world he's been born into has abysmally poor standards when it comes to magic, and everyone thinks he's still marked for failure!

Now it's up to Mathias to prove everyone wrong... world's strongest sage-style!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [MANGA UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/457)
description.fr: Dans un certain monde, vivait un homme qui excellait dans les combats magiques, les gens l'appelaient [Sage]. Cherchant la plus puissante magie de combat, il dévoua sa vie à rechercher toutes les magies et arts du combat existant. Mais la conclusion à laquelle il parvint fut cruel, [Mon corps n'est pas fait pour la magie de combat]. Pourtant il n'abandonna pas. Il scella son âme grâce à un art magique, et se réincarna à une lointaine époque. Les connaissances magiques de ce monde complètement différentes étaient à ses yeux incroyablement faible.
description.ru: Вот мир, а в нём живёт преуспевший в магических битвах человек, которого прозвали «Мудрецом». Стремясь стать сильнее, он посвятил себя изучению всех видов магии и боевых искусств, что только были. И в итоге, пришёл он к печальному выводу: «Моё тело не пригодно к магическим битвам». Но не сдался Мудрец. Запечатал душу свою магией, чтобы возродиться в далёком будущем. И узрел он мир изменившийся, в котором теория магии была невероятно низкого уровня.
description.vi: Trong thế giới ma thuật, sức mạnh và tương lai của một pháp sư được xác định trước khi sinh ra thông qua cái gọi là "Dấu hiệu" —của bốn biểu tượng phân loại năng khiếu của con người đối với ma thuật. Than thở về sự thật rằng dấu ấn của anh ta bị coi là không phù hợp cho chiến đấu và chỉ hữu ích cho việc gia tăng ma thuật, một nhà hiền triết vô cùng tài giỏi đã quyết định tái sinh hàng nghìn năm trong tương lai.Tái sinh trong vai Mathias Hildesheimr - một cậu bé sáu tuổi và là con trai thứ ba của gia đình công tước - cậu đạt được dấu hiệu cận chiến mà cậu hằng mong ước. Thật không may, người ta cũng phát hiện ra rằng kiến ​​thức của nhân loại về ma thuật và kiếm thuật đã giảm sút nghiêm trọng trong thời đại này; chỉ những thiết bị ma thuật kém chất lượng mới có thể được tìm thấy lẻ tẻ, trong khi ngay cả những phép thuật cơ bản nhất cũng đã bị lãng quên. Để tăng thêm sự xúc phạm cho chấn thương, dấu ấn hiện tại của anh ấy, từng được ca ngợi là mạnh nhất, giờ bị coi là tồi tệ nhất.Khi Mathias 12 tuổi, kiếm thuật vô song của anh đã đưa anh vào Học viện Hoàng gia thứ hai. Xua tan định kiến, anh ta nhanh chóng tạo nên những gợn sóng trong học viện và hơn thế nữa. Tuy nhiên, nhà hiền triết cũ đã phát hiện ra những dấu hiệu của các thế lực đen tối đang hoạt động trong bóng tối, và với việc nhân loại yếu hơn bao giờ hết, Mathias phải ngăn cản kế hoạch xấu xa của họ.

description.en: The manga centers on three sixth graders, Yoshiki Obana, Mikoto Tajo, and Kikuri Kushida, who meet up at morning to get to the bottom of their town's "seven mysteries" as a free summer vacation project. After finishing one meeting at their "secret base", Yoshiki meets a mysterious ghost on his way home.

My vision and my heart were completely taken over by "N."

The case of five missing junior high school boys. The massacre of an entire elementary school class. A car crash resulting in the deaths of two people. The letter "N" was left at each of these crime scenes.

An urban legend circulates, suggesting the main culprit is "N," a religious group thought to have collapsed 2,000 years ago.

What exactly is "N"?

Kuno Shio, who is half human and half alien, has a "glitch" that causes his body to turn into a gel-like mass when he gets lustful.
He enjoys attracting girls who gather because of his novelty, but one day, his parents are worried about Shio, who is only interested in splattering, and transfer him to a boarding school for boys.
At the moment when Souma Minato, the class representative who was assigned to take care of Shio, hugs him, Shio somehow splatters...!?
The popular pure love comedy for youth, which was popular on LINE manga, is now a full-color comic with original illustrations!!

title.en: Shoukan sareta Kenja wa Isekai wo Yuku ~Saikyou nano wa Fuyou Zaiko no Item deshita~

altTitles.ja: 召喚された賢者は異世界を往く ～最強なのは不要在庫のアイテムでした～

altTitles.en: A Sage Is Summoned to Another World: The Undesired Items Are Now the Strongest

altTitles.es-la: El sabio es invocado a otro mundo ~Los artículos más fuertes eran los menos deseados del inventario~

altTitles.ko: 소환된 현자는 이세계를 누빈다 ~최강인 것은 필요없는 재고 아이템이었습니다~

altTitles.zh-hk: 被召喚的賢者前往異世界～廢棄庫存道具才是最強～

altTitles.zh: 被召唤的贤者前往异世界～废弃库存道具才是最强～

altTitles.en: Wise Man Is Summoned to Another World ~The Strongest Items Were Those Less Desired in Inventory~

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9275ei/) (Japanese)

description.en: The last thing Ellin remembers is having to deal with a belligerent customer at her dead-end job. And when she opened her eyes… she’s “Solhwa,” the beautiful fourth concubine to the king of the Xyaran Empire. Between trying to learn the language and eating steak, Ellin’s trying to figure exactly what’s going on. Where is she? How did this happen? And who can she trust: Solhwa’s handsome charismatic childhood friend or the elegant, raven-haired king’s advisor?

title.ja: Nukitashi - Nukige Mitai na Shima ni Sunderu Watashi wa Dou Surya Ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: ぬきたし－抜きゲーみたいな島に住んでるわたしはどうすりゃいいですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Nukitashi: Nukige Mitai na Shima ni Sunderu Watashi wa Dou Surya Ii desu ka?

altTitles.en: Nukitashi - I Live on an Island Straight from a Fap Game, What on Earth Should I Do? -

altTitles.zh: 拔我－生活在拔作一樣的島上我該怎麼辦才好？

description.en: Indigo island is a place like no other, to deter emigration and attract tourism they have become the 'sex' destination as residents are punished if they are not have having frequent sex! On this crazy island, Hitori Misaki is still at school and one of the rare virgins trying to keep her secret and find love in such a lewd environment! The manga is based on the adult game "Nukitashi - Is this island Utopia or Dystopia?" by Qruppo!
One year after the previous Koha-Ace, they're back at it again! The curtain draws on another disrespectful battle royale that TYPE-MOON somehow manages to tolerate! (Sequel to Koha-Ace)

altTitles.ja: ブリーチ カラー版

description.en:
Ichigo Kurosaki has always been able to see ghosts, but this ability doesn't change his life nearly as much as his close encounter with Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society. While fighting a Hollow, an evil spirit that preys on humans who display psychic energy, Rukia attempts to lend Ichigo some of her powers so that he can save his family, but much to her surprise, Ichigo absorbs every last drop of her energy. Now a full-fledged Soul Reaper himself, Ichigo quickly learns that the world he inhabits is one full of dangerous spirits, and along with Rukia, who is slowly regaining her powers, it's Ichigo's job to both protect the innocent from Hollows and to help the spirits themselves find peace.   
  
Monochrome version won the 50th Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
description.es:
Ichigo Kurosaki siempre ha sido capaz de ver fantasmas, pero esta habilidad no cambia su vida tanto como su encuentro cercano con Rukia Kuchiki, una Segadora de Almas y miembro de la misteriosa Sociedad de las Almas. Mientras lucha contra un hueco, un espíritu maligno que se aprovecha de los humanos que muestran energía psíquica, Rukia intenta prestarle a Ichigo algunos de sus poderes para que pueda salvar a su familia, pero para su sorpresa, Ichigo absorbe hasta la última gota de su energía. Ahora que ya es un auténtico Segador de Almas, Ichigo aprende rápidamente que el mundo que habita está lleno de peligrosos espíritus y, junto con Rukia, que está recuperando lentamente sus poderes, el trabajo de Ichigo consiste en proteger a los inocentes de los huecos y ayudar a los propios espíritus a encontrar la paz.  
  
Versión monocroma ganó el 50º Premio Shogakukan Manga en la categoría Shounen.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do mangá Bleach. A história gira em torno de Kurosaki Ichigo um estudante de 15 anos que tem uma estranha capacidade de ver, tocar e falar com espíritos de pessoas mortas. Logo que o Shinigami (Deus da Morte) Kuchiki Rukia toma conhecimento dos poderes dele ela decide investigá-lo, e acaba em uma luta com um Hollow que foi atraído pelo forte poder espiritual de Ichigo, antes de ser derrotada pela criatura, Rukia passa seus poderes a Ichigo, o qual se torna um Shinigami, e após derrotar o Hollow ingressa em uma jornada para proteger os humanos e os espíritos da ameaça dos Hollows.

altTitles.ja: 武装少女マキャヴェリズム

description.en: The Private Aichi Symbiosis Academy was originally a high school for high-class girls. When it became co-ed, the girls, out of fear, asked to be permitted to bring weapons to school. When that was enforced, a five-member vigilante corps-like organization called the "Supreme Five Swords" was also formed. After many generations, the five swords eventually became a group which corrected problematic students, so the academy started proactively accepting such students in order to correct them. Nomura Fudou was sent to that school after being part of a huge brawl. What will he do when the only options he has after enrolling are being expelled from that school as well, or being corrected the way the rest of the male students there were… by being forced to dress and act like girls!
description.vi: Aichi ban đầu là một trường trung học dành cho nữ , khi nó trở thành nam nữ học chung, các cô gái, vì sợ hãi, đã yêu cầu được phép mang vũ khí đến trường. Khi điều đó được chấp thuận, một nhóm gồm năm thành viên được gọi là "ngũ kiếm TENKA GOKEN" đã được thành lập. Sau nhiều thế hệ, sau những thành tích đạt được, họ thu thập "trẩu" ở các trường khác về cải tạo lại. Nomura Fudou đã được gửi đến sau khi tham gia một cuộc ẩu đả lớn, có 2 lựa chọn là làm gay hoặc nghỉ học vĩnh viễn, main không chấp nhận, chống lại ngũ kiếm và thế là harem...
description.pt-br: A Escola Privada Aichi Simbiose era originalmente uma escola para garotas da alta classe, quando se tornou mista, as garotas, por medo, pediram para serem autorizadas a levar armas para à escola. Quando isso foi imposto, um corpo de vigilância de cinco membros, chamado as 'Cinco Espadas Suprema', também foi formado. Após muitas gerações, as cinco espadas, eventualmente, se tornaram um grupo que corrigia alunos problemáticos e por causa disso a escola começou de forma proativa aceitar esses estudantes, a fim de corrigi-los. Nomura Fudou foi enviado para essa escola depois de fazer parte de uma enorme briga, o que ele fará quando as únicas opções que tem depois de se matricular são ser expulso desta escola também ou ser corrigido da mesma forma como os outros estudantes do sexo masculino foram... Sendo forçados a se vestirem e agirem como garotas!
A obsessão de um homem lidera uma tripulação baleeira em uma missão de vingança mortal nesta adaptação de um romance clássico, um conto sobre a futilidade de colocar a humanidade contra a natureza.

description.en: She was just my classmate until yesterday but now she's my cute girlfriend☆! But everyday is nerve racking with her almost identical twin brother around. This is the popular three man fluff + meddling brother romantic comedy!

title.en: Choujigen Game Neptune: The Animation - Dengeki Comic Anthology

altTitles.en: Hyperdimension Neptunia: The Animation - Comic Anthology - Dengeki Comics

altTitles.ja: 超次元ゲイム ネプテューヌ THE ANIMATION 電撃コミックアンソロジー

description.en: An anthology comic of Choujigen Game Neptune (Hyperdimension Neptunia) by various mangaka.
Stories of a city's inhabitants guarded by a magical girl, as well as her own stories and questions she answers.

altTitles.ja: グラップラー刃牙完全版

altTitles.ja-ro: うちのメイドがウザすぎる！

altTitles.en: UzaMaid: Our Maid Is Way Too Annoying!

description.en:
Former Air Force Master Sergeant Kamoi Tsubame tries changing careers to finally get cute girls to wear her cute self-designed clothes. To that end she tries to get a job in the Takanashi household as a maid and babysitter to Yasuhiro Takanashi's spoiled daughter Misha Takanashi, as it seems that her mother is no longer present.  
  
Misha has successfully gotten rid of previous maids through playing devastating pranks like throwing mud, laying out banana peels to slip on and lighting the washed clothes on fire. In face of the newest applicant boasting that she has military experience, Misha even thinks about researching bomb making.
description.ja: 母を亡くし父と二人で暮らす小学生女子・ミーシャ。そんな父子家庭にやってきた新人家政婦は、やたらマッチョな上に三度の飯より幼女が大好きで…！？
